This study aims to monitor the nutritional status of humanitarian staff currently working in Gaza by tracking their weight. 
The aim of this project is to inform humanitarian decision-making, advocacy and diplomatic action to improve the lives of the affected population by providing real-time information on the nutritional status of humanitarian staff in Gaza. 
Read more about the project in the [study protocol](./protocol).

### Contributions

The project is implemented by Save the Children (SCI) with the support of the London School of Hygiene and Tropical Medicine (LSHTM), a university in the United Kingdom. 
There is no specific funding source for this study.

All participation is voluntary, with thanks to staff contributing their data and time.
